page.description: Pook 1-bit of data, offset in bits starting at 1.
page.original:
.POKEBIT() Syntax .POKEBIT( Position as N, Value as C) ArgumentDescription PositionThe bit position to write to. ValueThe bit value to write.
Description The .POKEBIT() method writes a bit Value into Position.The .POKEBIT() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the <BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob. Example dim bb as B bb = "A" bb.pokebit(3, 1) ? bb = E
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
